front.title: Communicating Proxy Configurations in Provisioning Domains

abstract.t: This document defines a mechanism for accessing provisioning domain information associated with a proxy, such a list of DNS zones that are accessible via an HTTP CONNECT proxy. It also defines a way to enumerate proxies that are associated with a known provisioning domain. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/tfpauly/privacy-proxy.
